With great power, comes a great price. Beware the blade you use.

Many souls have been struck down by this spear.

The power of the night flows through the rings smeared sapphire seeking an escape.

The Griffin Upgrade Stone is the only way to upgrade the Griffin Pet Griffin Pet, due to it being one of the four pets (the other three being the Grandma Wolf Pet Grandma Wolf Pet, the Kuudra Pet Kuudra Pet, and the Blank Icon.png Wisp Pet) which cannot have its rarity upgraded by Kat. It has 5 variants (including the Base form). The UNCOMMON variant is used to upgrade the Griffin Pet to UNCOMMON, and the RARE variant is used to upgrade the Griffin Pet to RARE and so on. Please note that you have to use the Upgrade Stone on a Griffin of the previous rarity, so the RARE one has to be used on an UNCOMMON Griffin and the EPIC has to be used on a RARE one. A recombobulated upgrade stone cannot upgrade a Griffin to its upgraded rarity.
